鮧鮧鮧
Links: aedict | jisho | koohii | hanziyuan | kanshudo | wiktionary | purpleculture | rtega | trainchinese | bkrs | humanum | Baido | yw11 | Pleco Search | Pleco

鮧字的基本解释

鮧
yí
〔鮧鱼〕体小，头、体平扁，眼小，口上有四对小须，体灰白色，背上和体侧各有一条白线。

鮧字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yí］
［《廣韻》以脂切，平脂，以。］
(1)见“鱁鮧”。
(2)见“鯸鮧”。
(3)鮧鱼。鱼纲鮡科。体灰色，背上体侧腹下各有一条白线。头及体均平扁，眼小，小须四对。为分布于我国云南西双版纳的小型鱼类。
[②]［tí］
［《廣韻》杜奚切，平齊，定。］
即鲇鱼。

鮧字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【魚字部】　鮧； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1469第16
【廣韻】以知切【集韻】延知切，?音夷。鱁鮧，鹽藏魚腸也。又魚名也。亦作鯷。【本草】鮧魚，卽鯷也。今人皆呼慈音，卽是鮎魚。【爾雅翼】鮧魚偃額，兩目上陳，口方頭大尾小，身滑無鱗，謂之鮎魚，言黏滑也。又【廣韻】杜奚切【集韻】【韻會】田黎切【正韻】杜兮切，?音題。與鮷同。大鮎也。

鮧字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
鮧字的起名意思

暂无。

Fang
Basic explanation of words
Fang
yí
[Partyfish] Small body, flat head and body, small eyes, four pairs of small whiskers on the mouth, gray-white body, and a white line on the back and side of the body.
Fang
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yí］
["Guangyun" cut with fat, flat fat, with. ]
(1) See "鱁鮧".
(2) See "鯸鮧".
(3) Parthenocissus. Ichthyosauridae. The body is gray, with a white line on the back and on the side and under the abdomen. The head and body are flat and flat, with small eyes and four pairs of mustaches. It is a small fish distributed in Xishuangbanna, Yunnan, my country.
[②]［tí］
["Guangyun" Du Xiqie, level and set. ]
That is catfish.
Fang
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Fish Character Department] 　鮧; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 1469-16
[Guang Yun] To know and cut [Ji Yun] To extend knowledge and cut,? Yin Yi. Xixiang, salt fish intestines are also. Also the name of the fish. Also used as anchovies. 【Materia Medica】Party fish, 卽鯷also. Nowadays everyone calls for Ciyin, and 卽 is a catfish. [Erya Wing] The scorpionfish has a small forehead, two eyes on the head, a square head and a small tail, and a slippery body without scales. It is called a catfish. Also [Guang Yun] Du Xiqie [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] Tian Liqie [Zheng Yun] Du Xiqie,? Sound title. The same as bao. Big catfish also.
Fang
